g.text: Use Case Diagram
User
Customer
Software Architect
Admin
Doctor
Hospital Manager
Organization's Administrator
System Administrator
Healthcare Staff Member
Patient
Have an integrated UI for all modules of the system
The application menu to adjust according to my role
The information show on the 3D visualization module
about room availability is in sync with the schedule
that was generated by the planning module
The information about healthcare staff, operation types,
and operation requests is in sync with the
information entered in the backoffice module
A sales and technical presentation of the overall solution
Adopt a decentralized architecture of the backoffice module
Add new Allergy
Search for Allergies
Add new Medical Condition
Search for Medical Conditions
Update the Patient Medical Record
Search for entries in the Patient Medical Record
Create a Surgery Appointment
Update a Surgery Appointment
Add new Types of rooms
Add new Specializations
List/search Specializations
Edit Specializations
Include the access of the Patient Medical Record
during the patient profile visualization and management
An automatic method to assign a set of operations (surgeries)
to several operation rooms
Be able to schedule surgeries to several operations rooms
using Genetic Algorithms
Study of state of the art of application of Robots and
Computer Vision in Hospitals, namely in the context of surgeries
Disaster recovery plan that meets the MBCO defined in sprint B
Be presented with a justification for the change(s)
to be made to the infrastructure in order to ensure a
MTD (Maximum Tolerable Downtime) of 20 minutes
Make a backup copy of the DB(s) to a Cloud environment using a script
Script to be created using the backup prepared
in previous US to manage the files resulting
from this backup on the following schedule
The US process of the DB backup to be kept in the Linux log
and alert the administrator when accessing the console
if a serious failure occurs in this process
The US backup of the DB backup to have a lifetime
of no more than 7 (seven) days, except for
the US retention of the monthly and annual copies
Presented with a BIA (Business Impact Analysis) of the final solution,
adapting if and where applicable the risk(s)
Access management to be implemented that meets
the appropriate security criteria
Clustering system to be implemented between the systems
that implement the SPA in a justified manner
The administrator to have SSH access to the virtual machine,
by certificate only, without a password
Create a public file share, in SMB/CIFS or NFS format,
to speed things up between the various teams
Ensure that backups have been carried out correctly if necessary
Select a room by left clicking on the corresponding surgical table
Press the “i” key, I want to display/hide an overlay containing
updated information about the selected room
Select a different room and the camera (and the spotlight,
if applicable) to move smoothly instead of instantly
Download my medical history in a portable and secure format
Request the deletion of my personal data
Know what data will be processed, in what manner, and exercise my right
Know for how long my personal data will be kept
